availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Casper Reidharr (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, shoe maker.)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, shoemaker and steward. Native of Switzerland. Son of Joseph Reidharr and Mary Reidharr. Shoemaker in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Steward in Louisville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 538.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, KY, June 1863, p. 420.
"Kaspar Reidhaar (1838-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial 94028161, accessed October 13, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94028161.
